content: Great overview, Matt! Tailwind CSS has revolutionized our development process. The pre-defined classes save so much time.
Tailwind CSS has made our design system more consistent across different projects. It's so easy to maintain and update.
I've found that push notifications in PWAs have increased our user engagement dramatically. This technology is a must-have for anyone looking to enhance their web applications.
Integrating PWAs into our existing web app was straightforward, and the performance boost was immediately noticeable. They're definitely worth the investment.
React.js is a fantastic Javascript library!
Lol, is that because you created it Mark? ;)
Excellent points, Matt. At Snap, we've seen firsthand how accessibility features improve user engagement and satisfaction.
We've made a commitment to accessibility, and it's been incredibly rewarding. Users appreciate the effort, and our SEO has improved as well.
Great insights, Matt. At Google, we've seen how serverless solutions can drive innovation and efficiency in web application development.
